content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with a potential tenant named Maryam Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was negotiating the rental price of my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed-upon price was 850 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I am not dissatisfied with the outcome as I was looking to get the highest possible price for my apartment. However, I don't use a scale to express satisfaction in these matters. I can only say that I am satisfied when the price meets or exceeds my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt
